product_name: Arc'teryx Thorium AR Hoodie Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: Combining premium goose down and synthetic insulation, the Arc'teryx Thorium AR Hoodie jacket functions as a warm standalone piece for outdoor activities and layers well under a shell. 750-fill-power European goose down in core area; Coreloft(TM) insulation in areas where moisture may build up. Premium 750-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Soft yet durable face fabric withstands abrasion and features a Durable Water Repellent finish. Synthetically insulated low-profile StormHood(TM) with binding. Zippered hand pockets; low-profile elasticized cuffs; hem drawcord. Arc'teryx Thorium AR Hoodie jacket layers easily and comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: Combining premium goose down and synthetic insulation, the Arc'teryx Thorium AR Hoodie jacket functions as a warm standalone piece for outdoor activities and layers well under a shell.
